mapper.select: SELECT review_no, id, product_no, content, review_regdate, score, review_image FROM (SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY review_regdate DESC) rn, review_no, id, product_no, content, review_regdate, score, review_image FROM review WHERE product_no=#{product_no}) WHERE rn <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn > (#{criteria.pageNum}-1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage}
select avg(score) as avg from review where product_no=#{product_no}
select product_no, round(avg(score),1) from review group by product_no
select count(*) from review where product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(review_no, id, product_no, content, score, review_image) VALUES(review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{product_no}, #{content}, #{score}, #{review_image})
